Convergence Lab Studio Library
==============================

This page serves as the documentation site for all Convergence Lab curated assets and widget for Vuforia Studio.

.. figure:: _static/screenshots/process.jpg
    :align: center

Quick Links
------------

* `Academic Team GitHub <https://github.com/PTC-Academic/>`_
* `Academic Team Asana <https://app.asana.com/0/722239394430940/board/>`_
